FrageText.de: Was können Sie an der Betriebsbremse bei stehendem Fahrzeug überprüfen?
FrageText.en: What can you check on the service brake when the vehicle is standing?
FrageText.hr: Što možete provjeriti na radnoj kočnici kad vozilo stoji?
FrageText.sl: Kaj lahko pri delovni zavori preverite, če vozilo miruje?
FrageText.tr: Duran bir aracın frenlerinde neyi kontrol edebilirsiniz?

de.Text: Den Stand der Bremsflüssigkeit, den Leerweg, die Dichtheit

en.Text: The brake fluid level, the distance that the brake pedal travels in which no braking occurs, and the density
The power brake, the brake lights
The perfect functioning of the brakes

hr.Text: Razinu kočne tekućine, neutralan hod, brtvljenje

sl.Text: Nivo zavorne tekočine, prosti tek in tesnost

tr.Text: Fren hidrolik yağı seviyesini, fren pedal boşluğunu ve frenlerde kaçak olup olmadığını
